attributes.title: THIS APP MADE ME GO TO THE ER
attributes.review: I was minding my own business when suddenly this app appeared on my cellular device. IT SHOCKED ME TO MY CORE!!! This app surprised me because I could not believe that such an ignorant and hateful man could have such a large platform. The shock that I felt made me have a heart attack and I had to go to the ER. I almost died!!! DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!!!!!
